item.title: Hello World !
item.description: This is shubham. I created this Blog to write something that i would found helpful. If you really want to understand something, the best way is to try and explain it to someone else. That forces you to sort it out in your mind. And the more slow and dim-witted your pupil, the more you have to break things down into more and more simple ideas. And that’s really the essence of programming.
